relation: There is always stuff going on around campus. Music, food, etc
Choose your classes very carefully, pay attention to the teachers and where the buildings are located.
This is the best college I could have chosen for my intended major. They have a wonderful education department. The campus is very pretty and all of the students are very friendly.

textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here I am enjoying being a student at the University of North Alabama. I do get homesick some, as I am six hours away from home. Even so, it has been relatively easy to make friends and there is always something to do on campus. You can try your hand at intramural sports of all kinds and of course there are the regular type clubs and Greek life. Am learning a lot I am learning a great deal at the University of North Alabama. The instructors seem to genuinely care about your success in the classroom. I enjoy the fact that they take the extra time needed to make sure each student is reaching their full potential. Login to rate or flag the reviews Monica from Huntsville, AL 11/13/2009 Reviewer is Researching this school. Reviewer has been to campus. 5 out of 5 people found this review useful. 2 of 50 Categories Comments Bang for the buck
